name: Flame Burst
summary: Deals Damage. All Pokemon adjacent to the target in Double, Triple, and Horde Battles will lose 1/16 of their maximum HP in typeless damage. This means that Flash Fire, Protect, Wide Guard, Endure, Wonder Guard, Substitute, Destiny Bond, Telepathy, Mold Breaker, accuracy/evasion are all bypassed.
viability: It's not really worth the investment. If you want to hit multiple targets, Heat Wave is a much more powerful alternative. If Flame Burst had more power, it would definitely be better.
